name: The Politician's Husband
summary: Political drama series about a marriage between two politicians, and what happens when the wife's career starts to overshadow her husband's.

eps.name: Episode1
eps.desc: Political drama. After replacing her husband in the cabinet after his resignation, Freya Hoynes must choose between her own career ambitions and publicly supporting her husband.
